name: Flickers of the Hearth
description:
A relaxing, hand-drawn experience about catching bugs. Take control of a lonely mouse and escape to a place without responsibilities, anxieties, or worries about the future. Close your eyes, and enjoy this peace while time allows.

CONTROLS
Left click to move.
Right click to interact.
